short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to query the currently logged in Force.com organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a plugin for Salesforce developer with this You can easily write a SOQL and Fetch results With out opening Developer console or Work Bench
